sub-events.comment: throw box, if it hits a turret the turret becomes active
Shoot 10 times a second while holding the left mouse button down. Adjust the bullet angle by a random amount (-4 to +4 degrees) to add some inaccuracy to the firing.
Allow WASD as alternate controls to the default arrow keys.
Shooting regularly, or with spread powerup
Throwing a box at a turret, 1 at the time
throwing boxes with A, auto-aimed, UNUSED
Placing a bomb, press again for detonation
